Pre-Game Insights: Netherlands tripped up South Africa in the previous two men's World Cups. They will be targeting a hat-trick, in conditions that might suit their style of batting better
South Africa have already played at Eisenhower Park, and have first-hand knowledge that run-scoring doesn't come easily
Miscellaneous Highlights: Conditions in New York may tempt Netherlands to include an extra seamer and they have Kyle Klein in their squad. But it could come at the expense of a shortened batting line-up and they may not want to risk that
Others: The match is part of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024, Group D, and is scheduled to take place on June 08, 2024, in New York
